---
title: "Code Review"
---

![](/img/code.png){fig-align="center" width="342"}

Code review is a common practice in industry settings, but is typically not taught in undergraduate statistics and data science courses. However, given the importance of communication and reproducibility, this skill is incredibly useful to start teaching students early. We have been studying some ways to develop student's habits around code review.
